docs.snippet: Disquieting reports and rumors are heard here and in Washington from time to time concerning the relations between the Argentine Republic and Chile. The representatives of the two nations in the diplomatic and consular service have discredited the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Disquieting reports and rumors are heard here and in Washington from time to time concerning the relations between the Argentine Republic and Chile. The representatives of the two nations in the diplomatic and consular service have discredited the reports that war was imminent between Argentina and Chile.

headline.main: TWO REPUBLICS MAY FIGHT; War Is Threatened Between Argentina and Chile. TROUBLE ABOUT THE BOUNDARY LINE Arbitration Might Avert War, but Arbitration Is Not Now Popular in Argentina -- Resources of Both Republics.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, May 21. -- "Have you any information," the Brazilian Minister, Senhor Salvador de Mendonca, was asked to-day, was to the insults alleged to have been contained in President Moraes's speech to Congress regarding Uruguay and to which the...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 21. -- "Have you any information," the Brazilian Minister, Senhor Salvador de Mendonca, was asked to-day, was to the insults alleged to have been contained in President Moraes's speech to Congress regarding Uruguay and to which the Uruguayan Minister at Rio Janeiro is said to have taken exception?"
docs.abstract: Rio Grande do Sul Revolt; War Against Uruguay to Suppress; Minister Mendonca's Views

headline.main: URUGUAY AND BRAZIL'S ACTS.; Minister Mendonca's Comments on the Quarrel of the Two States.

docs.snippet: GARDEN CITY, L.I., May 28. -- The twenty-eighth annual convention of the Episcopal Diocese of Long Island commenced here to-day at the Cathedral of the Incarnation. One hundred and thirty clergymen and laymen from Brooklyn and Long Island towns and...
docs.lead_paragraph: GARDEN CITY, L.I., May 28. -- The twenty-eighth annual convention of the Episcopal Diocese of Long Island commenced here to-day at the Cathedral of the Incarnation. One hundred and thirty clergymen and laymen from Brooklyn and Long Island towns and villages were present.

headline.main: THEIR ANNUAL CONVENTION; The Episcopal Diocese of Long Island Sends a Large Representation to Garden City -- Committees Appointed.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 14. -- The Director of the Mint, R.E. Preston, estimates the world's production of gold for the calendar year 1894 to have approximated 8,780,518 fine ounces of the value of $181,510,100, against $158,836,000 for 1893, showing an...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 14. -- The Director of the Mint, R.E. Preston, estimates the world's production of gold for the calendar year 1894 to have approximated 8,780,518 fine ounces of the value of $181,510,100, against $158,836,000 for 1893, showing an increase of $22,678,000 in 1894.

headline.main: GOLD AND SILVER CROPS; Production of Precious Metals for the Past Year. GREATEST IN ANY TWELVEMONTH The Increase in Gold Greatest in Africa and of Silver in South America -The Product by Countries.

keywords.value: CAPTS. J. B. EAKINS AND T. M. RYAN PETITION RETIREMENT

docs.snippet: We recently directed attention to the successful attempts of the authorities in Brazil and Argentina to suppress incipient epidemics of Asiatic cholera in those countries. A few years ago infection introduced at Buenos Ayres from Italy caused an...
docs.lead_paragraph: We recently directed attention to the successful attempts of the authorities in Brazil and Argentina to suppress incipient epidemics of Asiatic cholera in those countries. A few years ago infection introduced at Buenos Ayres from Italy caused an epidemic which spread throughout the southern half of the continent, and the total number of deaths was not less than 30,000.
docs.abstract: Sanitary Methods Improved; Cholera Epidemic Prevented

headline.main: MONTEVIDEO GREATLY EXCITED; Herrera Obes, Uruguay's Ex-President, Wounded by a Shot from His Revolver, Dropped in His Theatre Box.

headline.main: OUR PENSIONERS ALL OVER THE GLOBE; Almost Every Land Has Representatives of Them.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 16. -- Senor Zeballos, the Argentine Minister, is not in Washington and there is nobody connected with the Legation who can give any information with regard to the cable dispatch from Buenos Ayres announcing his resignation.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 16. -- Senor Zeballos, the Argentine Minister, is not in Washington and there is nobody connected with the Legation who can give any information with regard to the cable dispatch from Buenos Ayres announcing his resignation.
